item.title: config
item.description:
A list that is configuration data must have a key statement.
If the parent list is a configuration data, so the list is also a configuration data.

Theses modules :
ietf-netconf-partial-lock, ipfixpsamp, system, and test
of the netconfcentral module page (http://www.netconfcentral.com/modulelist) have a list with no key.

item.title: revision
item.description: When a module is imported by revision I must check if the revision date is in the imported module revisions.

item.title: xPath
item.description:
xPath expression are not checked inside must, when and leafref statements.
They are checked inside augment statements (but not for uses augment).
